block.p: COCA-COLA CO., Atlanta, named Jeffrey Dunn, deputy group president at Coca-Cola North America, to the post of president at the North America unit. He succeeds Ralph Cooper, who is retiring.
COCA-COLA CO., Atlanta, named Jeffrey Dunn, deputy group president at Coca-Cola North America, to the post of president at the North America unit. He succeeds Ralph Cooper, who is retiring.

DEUTSCHE LUFTHANSA A.G., Frankfurt, named Hanns Rech chief executive at its catering unit LSG Lufthansa Service Holding A.G., succeeding Helmut Woelki, who is leaving. Mr. Rech currently heads DHL Worldwide Express G.m.b.H.
MEDTRONIC, Minneapolis, named Arthur Collins, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive and chairman. He is succeeding William George.

SAFEWAY, Pleasanton, Calif., named Vasant Prabhu executive vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding David Weed, who is leaving. Mr. Prabhu had been president at the information and media group at McGraw-Hill.
